install.name: JFusion Magento Custom Block
install.author: JFusion Development Team
install.description: This module will display the content of a custom block of Magento into Joomla. You need to have the magelib plugin system and Jfusion installed.

field.name: block_type
field.label: Custom block type
field.description: Provide here the custom block type that you want to integrate in Joomla. It should be something of this kind: checkout/cart (see the structure of Magento it helps a lot or a layout file 'block type=checkout/cart')

field.name: block_name
field.label: Custom block name
field.description: Provide here the custom block name that you want to integrate in Joomla. It must be unique (see a layout file in Magento 'block type=checkout/cart name=cart ')

field.name: mage_template_path
field.label: Custom block template
field.description: Provide here the template path of the phtml file that you want to use. It must be an existing one in your magento active template. Exple: catalog/navigation/top.phtml.

field.name: enable_scriptaculous
field.label: Scriptaculous enable
field.description: Enable or not the scriptaculous script from Magento. Some modules of Magento need it for Ajax call or rollover/menu effect. BE AWARE: not compatible with module or content using Mootools of Joomla

field.name: xml_output
field.label: XML code
field.description: You can provide here a customized xml code. The syntax is the same as the one in layout xml files. See Magento Layout Documentation to know how to write it here. Priority is done to this code, it means if there is inhalt here, the field above won't be taken.

field.name: cache
field.label: Caching
field.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

field.name: cache_time
field.label: Cache Time
field.description: The time before the module is recached
